description: Passengers should fill in Health Surveillance Form in the plane, or any other transport means and submit them to Port Health Authorities upon arrival.
In Tanzania all travellers will be subjected to an intensive screening and where necessary COVID-19 rapid testing.
People residing in Tanzania are advised to avoid non-essential travels to COVID-19 affected countries
In Tanzania authorities announce further travel restrictions on April 4.
Tanzania suspends all international passenger flights on April 12 due to COVID-19.

In Tanzania after 14 days quarantine, passengers who have not developed symptoms of COVID-19 may leave the facilities and will be required to register personal information for future possible tracking purpose after March 23.
Tanzania sets up of the African Community’s Mobile Lab Community Lab project in Arusha for testing suspected coronavirus infections.

description: The Tanzanian government has ordered that each hospital prepare a separate ward to treat patients with COVID-19 on April 6.

Tanzania's partners on Wednesday donated medical supplies, technological gadgets and cash amounting to 6.226 billion Tanzanian shillings (about 2.7 million U.S. dollars) to assist the country in combating and containing the Covid-19 pandemic on April 8.
Tanzanian authorities on Tuesday pledged to protect all health workers who are taking care of COVID-19 patients on April 28.

In Tanzania Jumeme, a mini-network operator, co-financed by the European Commission, is launching a ""Covid-19 aid programme"" to support the Tanzanian government. The programme will provide free electricity for three months to 10 health care centres on the islands of Lake Victoria in Tanzania. The electricity will come from the company's local mini-hybrid solar grids on April 30.
All Ports of entry (airports and border crossings) in Tanzania  are conducting screening and travelers with a fever are diverted to secondary for further examination
In Tanzania passengers should fill in Health Surveillance Form in the plane, or any other transport means and submit them to Port Health Authorities upon arrival after March 23.
All travelers will be subjected to an intensive screening and where necessary COVID-19 rapid testing.

As of 23 March 2020,the government of Tanzania issued a directive to the effect that all travellers arriving in Tanzania were to be subjected to intensive screening where necessary Covid- 19 rapid testing.

In Tanzania Barrick Gold (TSX: ABX) (NYSE: GOLD), the world’s second-largest gold miner, announced that Twiga Minerals Corporation, its joint venture with the Tanzanian government, launched a support program to assist the east African country in combating and containing the covid-19 pandemic on April 9.

In Tanzania president John Magufuli made the declaration for nationwide prayer Thursday, urging Tanzanians to pray for God's protection and healing as 53 more people tested positive for the virus, raising the number of infections to 143 and one death Friday.on April 17.

Tanzania the Bank of Tanzania (BoT) has accepted more funds above the amount sought to be raised through the government securities auctioned in the last three consecutive trading sessions on April 29.
In Tanzania City Council Embarks On Programme to Raise Awareness On COVID-19 on April 17.
type_sub_cat: Disseminating information related to COVID-19 to the public that is reliable and factually accurate

description: Tanzania -- All travelers whether foreigners or returning residents arriving from COVID-19 most affected countries will be subjected to mandatory isolation for 14 days at their own cost at designated facilities identified by the Government.

In Tanzania all travellers whether foreigners or returning residents arriving from COVID-19 most affected countries, will be subjected to mandatory isolation for 14 days at their own cost at designated facilities identified by the Government from March 24.

As of 23 March 2020, the government of Tanzania declared all travelers arriving from COVID-19 most affected countries be subjected to mandatory isolation at their own cost at designated facilities identified by government.
target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries
